function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Substantial decrease in commercial water use, commuter traffic, and airport activity leading to lower revenues for infrastructure projects.","Impact":"Delayed infrastructure projects, maintenance, and upgrades, potentially causing a decline in the condition of existing infrastructure.","Mitigation":"Diversification of revenue sources, government funding, and investment in alternative infrastructure projects.","Technologies":"Smart infrastructure monitoring, digital revenue tracking, and predictive maintenance.","People":"Infrastructure developers, engineers, and maintenance personnel.","Owner":"Government agencies, private infrastructure firms."},{"Description":"Sharp decrease in transportation revenues and decline in gas tax receipts.","Impact":"Reduced funding for transportation projects, including maintenance of bridges and roadways.","Mitigation":"Exploration of alternative funding sources, prioritization of essential projects, and public-private partnerships.","Technologies":"Usage-based tolling, traffic flow optimization, and crowd analytics for public transportation.","People":"Transportation agencies, public transit users, and drivers.","Owner":"Government transportation departments, private investors, and transit authorities."},{"Description":"Potential permanent decline in the appeal of public transportation and shared ride modes due to fear of infections.","Impact":"Reduction in ridership, financial strain on transit agencies, and increased traffic congestion.","Mitigation":"Improved sanitation measures, promotion of contactless payment, and implementation of capacity restrictions.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, crowd monitoring sensors, and sanitation automation.","People":"Public transit users, transportation agencies, and urban planners.","Owner":"Transit authorities, city governments, and public health agencies."}]}
